alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gadsden and north central Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Comm College, or near Tallahassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Macon Community Park, Lake Iamonia, Lake Jackson, Tallahassee Mall, Scotland, Orchard Pond, Maclay State Gardens, Gibson, Killearn Lakes, Forest Meadows Park and Tallahassee Coml Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
